title: Lytics vs Zeotap comparison
content:
# Lytics vs Zeotap Comparison

## Core Strengths

**Lytics:**
- Machine learning and predictive modeling
- Content affinity analysis
- Behavioral scoring
- First-party data activation
- Real-time personalization capabilities

**Zeotap:**
- Identity resolution across devices and channels
- Third-party data enrichment
- Global data coverage
- Compliance and consent management
- Deterministic identity matching

## Data Collection

**Lytics:**
- JavaScript tag for websites
- Mobile SDKs for apps
- API-based collection
- Focus on behavioral event collection
- Content interaction tracking

**Zeotap:**
- Pixel-based collection
- Server-to-server integration
- Offline data onboarding
- CRM data integration
- Focus on identity-based collection

## Audience Building

**Lytics:**
- Predictive audiences based on ML models
- Behavioral segmentation
- Content affinity-based audiences
- Interest and intent modeling
- User journey stage identification

**Zeotap:**
- Demographic and firmographic segmentation
- Cross-device audience unification
- Lookalike modeling
- Third-party data enrichment
- Global audience reach

## Use Cases

**Lytics excels at:**
- Behavioral targeting
- Content personalization
- Customer journey optimization
- Predictive engagement scoring
- Cross-channel content recommendations

**Zeotap excels at:**
- Identity resolution
- Audience expansion
- Data enrichment
- Global reach and scale
- Privacy-compliant data handling

## Integration Capabilities

**Lytics:**
- Strong content management system integrations
- Web personalization tools
- Marketing automation platforms
- Focus on activation for owned channels

**Zeotap:**
- Extensive advertising platform integrations
- DSP and SSP connections
- Global marketing platform support
- Focus on paid media activation

## Platform Philosophy

**Lytics:**
- Focus on making first-party data more intelligent
- Emphasis on behavioral understanding
- Content-centric approach to engagement

**Zeotap:**
- Focus on identity unification and scale
- Emphasis on data enrichment and reach
- Identity-centric approach to marketing
